name: Quick Potato Lentil Soup
description: Each serving provides one third of your daily fibre requirement, beneficial for heart health, and a whopping 27 g of body-building protein!
preparation: Combine first 8 ingredients in a Multipurpose Pot. Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer over medium-low heat for 20 minutes.
tips: Serve with freshly baked Epicure Focaccia Bread or Epicure Cheddar Herb and Garlic Biscuits.

products.name: CCB Dip Mix
summary: Cheese. Chives. Bacon. How's that for a totally irresistible trio? Our very own smoky vegetarian bacon, made from pinto beans, is the secret star of this oh-so-yummy dip.
This blend is all about versatility and we recommend taking it way beyond the dip bowl—use CCB in any dish that could use a little levelling up.
